about_the_game:
3 LEVELS - THERE ARE THREE CHALLENGING LEVELS, DON'T THINK IT WILL BE EASY.

DIFFICULTY - A HARD GAME, FROM THE FIRST LEVEL, WHICH GETS HARDER AS YOU PROGRESS.

LIFE BAR - YOU HAVE A LIFE BAR AND CAN BE HIT UP TO THREE TIMES BY ENEMIES, PROJECTILES AND THORNS, DON'T BE RASH, THINK BEFORE YOU ACT.

DEADLY FALLS - WATCH OUT FOR WATER, IF YOU FALL, YOU'RE DEAD INSTANTLY.

CONTROLS - RUN, JUMP AND SHOOT. CONTROLS PERFECTLY ADJUSTED FOR JOYSTICK AND KEYBOARD.

POWER UP - YOU'LL FIND POWER UPS SCATTERED THROUGHOUT THE LEVELS, WHICH WILL INCREASE THE DAMAGE YOU DEAL AND CHANGE THE WAY YOUR GUN SHOOTS.

PLASMA - THE PLASMA CANNON IS A SPECIAL SHOT WITH AREA DAMAGE. YOU CAN FIND AMMUNITION THROUGHOUT THE LEVELS. HOWEVER, THE SHOTS ARE LIMITED, USE IT WISELY.

BOSSES - BE CAREFUL WHEN FACING BOSSES, THEY ARE TOUGHER AND HAVE POWERFUL ATTACKS, BE QUICK AND MEMORIZE THEIR BEHAVIOR, OTHERWISE THEY WILL FINISH YOU OFF.

SOUNDTRACK - CONTAGIOUS AND ATMOSPHERIC MUSIC, FOR THOSE WHO LIKE HEAVY ROCK IT'S A REAL TREAT.
